DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether hemodynamic optimization photoplethysmography ( ClearSight , Edwards Lifesciences , Irvine , CA ) colorectal surgery could decrease incidence perioperative complication .
DOC.brief_title: Perioperative Hemodynamic Optimization Using Photoplethysmography Colorectal Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: All patient receive photoplethysmography monitoring , monitor blind control group .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Colorectal surgery Pregnant woman Black skin Chronic renal insufficiency ( MDRD < 30 ml/min )
